description:
"I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death. His widow, Isabelle, summons Lupin to her home, with her requesting he investigate her case. There are three suspects, and then... more murders. Along with the old castle being locked down. "I`m Jim Barnett. A detective, hired by the countess." Get a good look at the once time appearence of Detective Lupin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tantei Jim Barnett Sansei no Aisatsu
探偵ジム・バーネット三世の挨拶
